content: st r8 r7 reminder note when starting a row ch4 = 1dc + ch1 or ch5 = 1dc + ch2 ch1 = skip 1 in the below row unless otherwise indicated the double_crochet & ch1 create a fan - these are what we ll count stretchy toes shawl - v3 ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved 7 body a yarn over & insert hook in next double_crochet stitch and pull up a loop 3 loops on hook b yarn over & pull through only the first two loops 2 loops on hook c yarn over & insert hook in next available double_crochet stitch pull up a loop 4 loops on hook 2dctog 2 double_crochet together d yarn over & pull through only the first two loops 3 loops remaining on hook e yarn over & pull through three remaining loops row 9 | side count 37sts ch5 skip ch1sp 1dc in next st ch2 x3 decrease ch2 & skip1 1dc in next st x3 ch2 & skip1 *repeat until end of side 1dc ch2 1dc ch2 & skip2 1dc in next st ch2 x3 decrease ch2 & skip1 1dc in next st x3 ch2 & skip1 *repeat until last ch1sp of side ch2 & skip1 1dc in last st r9 r8 row 10 | side count 41sts ch3 2dc 1dc in each st until center space 2dc ch2 2dc 1dc in each st until one st left 3dc in last st turn r10 r9 crochet law #33 the required hook for a project is always missing unneeded hooks exist in excess this is somehow always true stretchy toes shawl - v3 ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved 8 body r10 r9 r8 r7 r6 r5 r4 r3 r2 r1 stretchy toes shawl - v3 ©2025 huskyberry llc all rights reserved 9 body repeat the row to row 64 as indicated row pattern repeat row stitch count r11 cross clusters r5 45 r12 double_crochet r6 49 r13 shells & chains r7 5 shells & 4 ch5sp r14 double_crochet extra chs r8 5 fans & 8 ch2sp r15 double_crochet chs r9 61 r16 double_crochet r10 65 r17 cross clusters r5 69 r18 double_crochet r6 73 r19 shells & chains r7 7 shells & 6 ch5sp r20 double_crochet extra chs r8 7 fans & 12 ch2sp r21 double_crochet chs r9 85 r22 double_crochet r10 89 r23 cross clusters r5 93 r24 double_crochet r6 97 r25 shells & chains r7 9 shells & 8 ch5sp r26 double_crochet extra chs r8 9 fans & 16 ch2sp r27 double_crochet chs r9 109 r28 double_crochet r10 113 r29 cross clusters r5 117 r30 double_crochet r6 121 r31 shells & chains r7 11 shells & 10 ch5sp r32 double_crochet extra chs r8 11 fans & 20 ch2sp r33 double_crochet chs r9 133 r34 double_crochet r10 137 r35 cross clusters r5 141 stretchy toes shawl -
